headline: Kyndryl delays quarterly filing, flags financial reporting concerns
summary: Software provider Kyndryl on Monday delayed the filing of its ​quarterly report, saying it anticipates material ‌weaknesses in its internal control over financial reporting for ‌multiple periods, including the first two quarters of fiscal 2026.  Separately, the company also announced ⁠the departure of ‌its finance chief David Wyshner and the stepping down of Vineet ‍Khurana as global controller, effective immediately.  A corporate controller is typically the chief accountant of a company.

content.title: Kyndryl delays quarterly filing, flags financial reporting concerns
content.summary: Software provider Kyndryl on Monday delayed the filing of its ​quarterly report, saying it anticipates material ‌weaknesses in its internal control over financial reporting for ‌multiple periods, including the first two quarters of fiscal 2026.  Separately, the company also announced ⁠the departure of ‌its finance chief David Wyshner and the stepping down of Vineet ‍Khurana as global controller, effective immediately.  A corporate controller is typically the chief accountant of a company.

headline: Kyndryl (NYSE:KD) Misses Q4 CY2025 Revenue Estimates, Stock Drops 25.3%
summary: IT infrastructure services provider Kyndryl (NYSE:KD) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025 as sales rose 3.1% year on year to $3.86 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.52 per share was 13.7% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
